title: Holistic Natural Medicine
cleaned_text: Dr. Erika S. Gabriello, DACM, L.Ac Integrative Healing Arts Acupuncture - Functional Meridian Analysis - Foods/Allergy Testing Homeopathy - Detoxifiction - Whole Health Nutrition Eastern/Western Herbal Medicine Most of our patients have experienced one or more of the following: An ailment that leaves you tired, drained and overwhelmed - or takes up too much focus in your life The state of your health is inhibiting you from doing the activities you love and you feel like you've lost control You're experiencing multiple symptoms and understand your diagnosis, but conventional methods of treatment have been ineffective You would prefer a drug free, holistic approach You are somewhat unfamiliar with acupuncture, herbology, homeopathy and nutritional therapy - but want to learn more.
